message.body: On the seventh we have a welcoming tradition at school..classes start tomorrow, I am very excited. Let me know if there is another night that works..evenings are better now, with the exception of Tuesday
I will let you know! I lost all my apps and i am trying to put them back together what time were you sup to go to wtc on friday? Again i am really look
ing forward to seeing you this is a very important time for you!
You had said at three or four, but that won't work for me. Thursday or Monday evenings would be good
Ok i will keep posted for thur in the afternoon inwest philly or monday at wtc!
